result.title: Dissemination events
result.description: Dissemination of research findings, including in Trujillo and Lambayeque. Presentation of the projects and its results both in events in Lima, Trujillo and Lambayeque within the specialists of the culture area, press and society. The results of the model for a long-term sustainability aim to be presented and be assumed by the authorities as well as by public measures.

result.title: EPICA Final Conference
result.description: Summary report of the Final international Conference with presentation of main results focusing on their relevance to and implications for local uptake, implementation and sustainability. This conference will be organized in cooperation with all partners, and different groups of stakeholders, including HUBs, local edutech companies, and policy makers. Results of the conference, videos, and other material will be published on website and EPIC social media
